channel.title: Data science on Ted Laderas, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Data science on Ted Laderas, PhD

item.title: If you want to talk with me for an informational interview
item.description: I have had many people who have asked me for informational interviews. They tell me that they are interested in Data Science and want to hear about what I do on a day to day basis. To be honest, I’ve begun to dread these kinds of interviews. Inevitably, I spend a lot of energy explaining what I do to someone who rarely follows up. Consequently, I don’t find these interviews rewarding at all.
